Record numbers (Sea/Ocean classification): Adriatic Sea: 10 , Atlantic Ocean: 1 , Balearic Sea: 2 , East China Sea: 1 , Ionian Sea: 16 , Irish Sea: 1 , Ligurian Sea: 1 , Mediterranean Sea: 1 , Sea of Japan : 6 , Tyrrhenian Sea: 5 , Yellow Sea: 1 ;
total: 45 .

Record numbers (FAO classification): FAO 27 : 2 , FAO 37 : 35 , FAO 61 : 8 ;
total: 45 .

Remarks: This species is known from many European and Asian localities in the temperate zone. Reported mainly from the intertidal zone, it has also been found from the subtidal down to ca. 80 m bsl, inhabiting different types of sand and gravel.
